review_data.title: Wird vom Personal bestolen
review_data.content: Aufgepasst auf eurer Sachen, alles was nicht nagelfest ist, wird gestohlen vom Personal. Es ist so, nicht cool.

review_data.title: cute place, but badly transformed
review_data.content: Unfortunately the music upstairs is too loud, so there is no way ro have a conversation up there. Also, we recommend to install better ventilation, as you can barely see your friends through all the smoke. With some real effort put into it, the place...More

review_data.title: Quiet
review_data.content: Dropped in for a quick coffee after several hours wandering around the old town. Quiet in middle of afternoon. Did not partake of more exotic offerings on the menu.

review_data.title: Friendly smoke bar in Zurich
review_data.content: Nice beer, cafe, cbd-smoke bar. Right in n the middle of old town in Zurich. Super friendly bartenders. Was quite empty when we went here on a weekday in the end of summer. Prices are reasonable. I think they serve some food here too, it...More

review_data.title: What an awesome place for music lovers
review_data.content: What an awesome place for music lovers. Wednesday is for jamming and it was a true session indeed... folks coming in and out and really jamming... something I experienced for the first time in my life there were a few imperfect music moments here and...More

review_data.title: Eine Institution
review_data.content: Als Jugendlicher ist man viel im Kon-Tiki abgehängt. Danach lange nicht mehr gewesen, doch die Bar hat immer noch Charme....More

review_data.title: homegrown
review_data.content: It is the place for cannabis consumers. It was really cozy and they had a good choice of drinks. Also, you can buy the weed from them and then smoke it on the second floor. Cool place!

review_data.title: Tradition, Kult und Gemütlichkeit!
review_data.content: Egal ob Kaffee, Bier oder Cocktail - alles in gemütlicher Atmosphäre und zu vernünftigen Preisen. Es gibt zwei Stockwerke, im...More

review_data.title: Fun Place
review_data.content: If you like to enjoy weed, this is the place to go to. We were there for drinks since we were staying right across the street from it.

review_data.title: Gemütliche Location
review_data.content: War mit einer Freundin da. Wurden freundlich begrüsst und stets schnell und gut bedient. preis-leistungsverhältnis war top! Die Musik war...More

review_data.title: Eine traditionelle Bar mit einem Hauch Nostalgie.
review_data.content: Ein Streifzug durch das Niederdorf am späten Abend lädt zu einem Besuch der Kon-Tiki Bar ein. Junge und junggebliebene Leute...More

review_data.title: Genuine
review_data.content: In a street that was almost completely taken over by lounges and hipster bars this is one of the "anachronisms" still alive and kicking Genuine and friendly, with fair prices

review_data.title: Niederdorf bar with theme nights, live entertainment
review_data.content: Their main floor has a bar with stool seating, a couple of stand tables, and about five short tables. There was a friendly lady at the bar. No beers on tap only bottled ones. I had a Hurlimann beer (5.50CHF). Upstairs is another bar, with...More

review_data.title: Alright bar!
review_data.content: This is a good bar with different music focus on different nights. Saturday's it's mainly rock and on Sunday's it's mainly reggae and dub.

review_data.title: Cool Bar
review_data.content: Saw an interesting South African band perform there. Stage was small, but music was great and crowd was into it. Great hangout to meet some real locals.

review_data.title: Zürich pur
review_data.content: Gehört zum Stadtbild einfach dazu. Super Preis Leistung und ein muss auf jeder Bar Tour durch die Stadt.
